teamwork.translation[0].definitions[0].d: when a group of people work effectively together
teamwork.translation[0].definitions[0].e: We want to encourage good teamwork and communication.
teamwork.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the ability of a group of people to work well together
teamwork.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Success has come from effective teamwork.
There is an emphasis on teamwork in the company.
